guiTeacher.components

Class Pane

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • guiTeacher.userInterfaces.ComponentContainer
              • guiTeacher.components.Pane
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Clickable, Visible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TypingPane

    public class Pane
extends ComponentContainer
implements Clickable
    Pane is a ComponentContainer that is itself a Component. It can also be thought of as a "view", "layout" or "subscreen". It has its own Arrayist of Visible objects but also has x-, y-, coordinates and width and height
    Author:
    bnockles
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
